content.title: Use and Transfer of Information
content.text: We use the information you provide solely for the purposes related to your request or inquiry. We do not transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except when it is necessary in accordance with applicable law. Your data may also be used to send information about our services or products if you have given your consent.

content.title: Information Security
content.text: We take all necessary measures to protect the information you provide from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security of data transmission over the internet.

content.title: Links to Third-Party Sites
content.text: Our site may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy policies or information protection practices of such sites.

content.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
content.text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the date of the last update indicated.

content.title: Contact Us
content.text: If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at: cactusbusines@gmail.com
